txt.en: You have found a wounded soldier from the household of Thornhope hiding in the ruins
'I believe...I can make it...from here...thank you, [placeholder]!'
You have escorted Éorpwald to safety
While scouring the ruins of Thornhope for survivors, you discovered a wounded soldier.
While scouring the ruins of Thornhope for survivors, you discovered a wounded soldier.\n\nYou should help the soldier to safety.
Éorpwald is hiding behind a wall in Thornhope.\n\nYou should escort Éorpwald to safety.
'Ah... at last... aid has come! I see you have cleared a way from the gate... I... believe I can make it out... from here.\n\n'Thank you!'
Éorpwald is hiding behind a wall in Thornhope.\n\nYou should escort Éorpwald to safety.
Éorpwald is at Béortnoth's camp, outside of Thornhope.\n\nYou should speak with Éorpwald when you return to Béortnoth's camp.
'I... I will heal. Thank you, stranger... without you... I would have perished.'
Talk to Éorpwald at Béortnoth's camp
